text: The Golden Hamster Saga is a series of five books written by Dietlof Reiche. It is told from the viewpoint of a Golden Hamster, Freddy Auratus, the main character. However the epilogue of the final book is narrated by Mr. John, due to Freddy's departure to 12th century Syria. Category:German children's books Category:Series of books
title: Golden Hamster Saga
